concepts.definition: Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.

properties.description: Indicates that the code is abstract - only intended to be used as a selector for other concepts

valueset.name: v3.QueryRequestLimit
valueset.description:
Definition:
Defines the units associated with the magnitude of the maximum size limit of a query response that can be accepted by the requesting application.
